meanings.definition: Possessing or showing courage or determination
meanings.sent1: The valiant knight bravely faced the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She admired the valiant efforts of the firefighters.
meanings.sent3: The valiant squirrel tried to scare away the big dog.
meanings.sent4: Her valiant spirit shone through even in the darkest times.
meanings.sent5: The valiant soldier's actions will be remembered for generations.

meanings.sent1: In the story, the valiant hero saved the day.
meanings.sent2: The valiant explorer ventured into the unknown jungle.
meanings.sent3: The valiant cat stood up to the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: His valiant heart never wavered in the face of danger.
meanings.sent5: The valiant act of kindness touched everyone's hearts.

meanings.sent1: The valiant decision to speak up changed everything.
meanings.sent2: She made a valiant attempt to break the record.
meanings.sent3: The valiant flower stood out among the rest in the garden.
meanings.sent4: His valiant style of leadership inspired his team.
meanings.sent5: The valiant colors of the sunset painted the sky beautifully.
